short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse web and capture tabs you like, easy and quick.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick tab capture tool.

Capture and manage your digital experiences effortlessly with our powerful Chrome extension. Seamlessly take screenshots of browser tabs, full pages, or specific regions, and access your latest 10 captures from a customized new tab page. Each screenshot can be easily copied, shared, or downloaded, enhancing your browsing productivity..

*****Version 1.3.2*****
* As per user feedback, images are downloaded directly
* Bug fixes & improvement

*****Version 1.3.0*****
* Full page screenshot functionality
* Bug fixes & improvement

*****Version 1.2.3*****
* Screenshot share functionality
* UI Improvement
* Bug fixes

*****Version 1.2.1*****
* Bug fixes

*****Version 1.2*****
* Screenshot history feature - View and download the last 10 screenshots as needed.
* Bug fixes
